Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back and reminds me of your favorite film from childhood as well as being pretentious and melancholic at the sametime. Brotherly tensions between Angad Ahuja and Harman Arora seem to be a positive thing found in most classic Disneylike movies.
